decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): Site Location Map; 01 Rev 01 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plans); 02 Rev 01 (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plans); 03 Rev 01 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plans); 04 (Existing and Proposed Elevations-1); 05 (Existing and Proposed Elevations-1); 06 (Block Plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear extension; insertion of two windows to the side (West) elevation; and insertion of a window to the first-floor front elevation.
